name: A. Pineapple Incident
statement:
Ted has a pineapple. This pineapple is able to bark like a bulldog! At
time (in seconds) it barks for the first time. Then every seconds after
it, it barks twice with second interval. Thus it barks at times , , , ,
, etc. Barney woke up in the morning and wants to eat the pineapple, but
he can’t eat it when it’s barking. Barney plans to eat it at time (in
seconds), so he asked you to tell him if it’s gonna bark at that time.
